tasks.label: Start PostgreSQL Docker
tasks.command: docker start TestDataBase || docker run --name TestDataBase -p 5438:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=12345 -d postgres

tasks.label: View Database
tasks.command: docker exec -it TestDataBase psql -U postgres -d test_system -c "\dt"

tasks.label: View Users
tasks.command: docker exec -it TestDataBase psql -U postgres -d test_system -c "SELECT id, email, username, is_admin FROM users;"

tasks.label: View Logs
tasks.command: docker exec -it TestDataBase psql -U postgres -d test_system -c "SELECT * FROM user_logs ORDER BY action_time DESC LIMIT 10;"
